desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Vessie Chicken.

value.text: Reward for reaching Reputation Level 6 in Fontaine

customize.name: Fowl

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Marcotte
customize.desc: A pink flower with a pearl-like luster and rich scent profile. It is one of the most important ingredients in a perfumer's arsenal.

customize.name: Fermented Juice
customize.desc: A fermented juice with a unique fruity scent. It is often used as a marinade.

customize.name: Vessie Chicken
customize.desc: A famous Fontainian cuisine. "Vessie" means "bladder" in Fontaine. As the name suggests, the seasoned chicken meat is enclosed in a forest boar's bladder when being poached in a meat broth. The bladder will puff out during the process like a rotund Specter. People usually only eat the chicken meat inside.
